entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is described as having misshapen features. He is also referred to by his last name, Greyback.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is another name for Vernon, and he is described as having foul breath.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in this passage. He has a taught scar on his forehead.

relationships.description: Greyback touches Harry's forehead with a filthy finger, causing pain to Harry.
Greyback asks Harry if he wears glasses.
